00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <conio.h>
00033 #include <math.h>
00034 #include "midas.h"
00035 
00036 /*---- globals -----------------------------------------------------*/
00037 
00038 typedef struct {
00039    unsigned short io_base;
00040 } DASTEMP_SETTINGS;
00041 
00042 #define DASTEMP_SETTINGS_STR "\
00043 IO Base = WORD : 0x220\n\
00044 "
00045 
00046 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00047 
00048 INT dastemp_init(HNDLE hKey, void **psettings, INT channels)
00049 {
00050    int status, size;
00051    HNDLE hDB;
00052    DASTEMP_SETTINGS *settings;
00053 
00054    /* allocate info structure */
00055    settings = calloc(1, sizeof(DASTEMP_SETTINGS));
00056    *psettings = settings;
00057 
00058    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00059 
00060    /* create settings record */
00061    status = db_create_record(hDB, hKey, "", DASTEMP_SETTINGS_STR);
00062    if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
00063       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00064 
00065    size = sizeof(DASTEMP_SETTINGS);
00066    db_get_record(hDB, hKey, settings, &size, 0);
00067 
00068 #ifdef OS_WINNT
00069    /* open IO address space */
00070    status = ss_directio_give_port(settings->io_base, settings->io_base + 0x0F);
00071    if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
00072       cm_msg(MERROR, "dastemp_init", "DirectIO driver not installed");
00073       return FE_ERR_HW;
00074    }
00075 #endif
00076 
00077    return FE_SUCCESS;
00078 }
00079 
00080 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00081 
00082 #define CT0     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x00)
00083 #define CT1     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x01)
00084 #define CT2     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x02)
00085 #define CTC     (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x03)
00086 #define STATUS  (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x04)
00087 #define INTR    (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x05)
00088 #define LCZS    (unsigned short) (settings->io_base+0x06)
00089 
00090 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00091 
00092 INT dastemp_get(DASTEMP_SETTINGS * settings, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00093 {
00094    unsigned short int data;
00095    double temp;
00096 
00097 //###
00098 //*pvalue = (float) (channel/10.0);
00099 //return FE_SUCCESS;
00100 
00101    /* set up counter 1 for gating */
00102    _outp(CTC, 0x72);            // HW one shot
00103    _outp(CT1, 0x40);            // 0x9C40 for 50 Hz rej.
00104    _outp(CT1, 0x9C);
00105 
00106    /* set up counter 0 for V-F counting */
00107    _outp(CTC, 0x30);            // event counting mode for cntr0
00108    _outp(CT0, 0xFF);            // 0xFFFF
00109    _outp(CT0, 0xFF);
00110    _outp(LCZS, 0);              // load cntr0
00111 
00112    /* select channel */
00113    _outp(STATUS, (channel & 31) | 0x80);
00114 
00115    /* trigger a conversion */
00116    data = _inp(CTC);
00117 
00118    /* wait until "dummy" conversion is ready */
00119    do {
00120       data = _inp(STATUS);
00121    } while (data & (1 << 5));
00122 
00123    /* set up counter 0 for V-F counting */
00124    _outp(CTC, 0x30);            // event counting mode for cntr0
00125    _outp(CT0, 0xFF);            // 0xFFFF
00126    _outp(CT0, 0xFF);
00127    _outp(LCZS, 0);              // load cntr0
00128 
00129    /* trigger a conversion */
00130    data = _inp(CTC);
00131 
00132    /* wait until "real" conversion is ready */
00133    do {
00134       data = _inp(STATUS);
00135    } while (data & (1 << 5));
00136 
00137    /* latch counter command */
00138    _outp(CTC, 0x00);
00139 
00140    /* read data */
00141    data = _inp(CT0);
00142    data |= (_inp(CT0) << 8);
00143    data = 65535 - data;
00144 
00145    temp = data * 0.0125 - 273.15;
00146 
00147    /* round temperature to 0.01 deg */
00148    temp = ((int) (temp * 100 + 0.5)) / 100.0;
00149 
00150    /* return temperature */
00151    *pvalue = (float) temp;
00152 
00153    return FE_SUCCESS;
00154 }
00155 
00156 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00157 
00158 INT dastemp(INT cmd, ...)
00159 {
00160    va_list argptr;
00161    HNDLE hKey;
00162    INT channel, status;
00163    float *pvalue;
00164    void *info;
00165 
00166    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00167    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00168 
00169    switch (cmd) {
00170    case CMD_INIT:
00171       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00172       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00173       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00174       status = dastemp_init(hKey, info, channel);
00175       break;
00176 
00177    case CMD_GET:
00178       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00179       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00180       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00181       status = dastemp_get(info, channel, pvalue);
00182       break;
00183 
00184    default:
00185       break;
00186    }
00187 
00188    va_end(argptr);
00189 
00190    return status;
00191 }
